title: Nomad launches 65W dual-port USB-C GaN charger with AirPods case-sized footprint
content:
Nomad is out with its most powerful GaN charger yet, the dual-port 65W AC Adapter. This charger can power up a MacBook and iPad or iPhone or a Google Pixel 6 and Chromebook with a super-compact footprint the size of an AirPods Pro charging case. Read on for more including hands-on details.

moreâ€¦

The post Nomad launches 65W dual-port USB-C GaN charger with AirPods case-sized footprint appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Nomad has launched a dual-port USB-C GaN 65W AC Adapter with a super compact design with the footprint of an AirPods charging case.
